Column.Name: DateTimes as of Page Load
Chart Type - Value of Active Contracts
Chart Type - Number of Active Contracts
Risk Data
Contract Action
Column.ValidationFormula:
IF( AND( $thisValue = "Raise Payment Certificate", [Unapproved Payment Certificate] = TRUE, ), "Existing Payment Certificate must be processed before raising a new Payment Certificate",
$thisValue = NULL, "Select an Action" )

Column.Name: Contract Actions List
Column.Formula:
LET $set := ARRAY( IF(ARRAY_INDEXOF([Enabled Contract Registers], "Extensions") > 0, "Raise Extension"), IF(ARRAY_INDEXOF([Enabled Contract Registers], "Request for Information") > 0, "Raise Request for Information"), IF(ARRAY_INDEXOF([Enabled Contract Registers], "Payment Certificate") > 0, "Raise Payment Certificate"), IF(ARRAY_INDEXOF([Enabled Contract Registers], "Variations") > 0, "Raise Variation") );
RETURN ARRAY_WHERE($set, $(i, item) $item <> NULL())

Column.Name: Chart Type - Value of Variations per Type
Date From - Number of Variations per Year
Date To - Number of Variations per Year
Filter Type - Number of Variations per Year
Show First Time Message
Column.DefaultValueFormula: EBMS_GET_PREFERENCE("Contracts - Hide First Time Message") <> TRUE

Column.Name: Contract Filter
Contract Search

Mapping.LocalColumnName: Reason - Number of Variations per Year
Reason - Value of Variations per Type

Binding.Expression: [Dashboard Data]
ARRAY_SELECT(EACH [Action], $(i, item) HASH_GET($item, "Action"))
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Action], $(i, item) HASH( "value", HASH_GET($item, "Action"), "text", "" ) )

RichLabel.Text:
<style type="text/css">.svg-report-icon 
{
  fill: #4682B4; background: white;
}
.svg-report-icon:hover 
{
  fill: white; background: #4682B4;
}
.core-horizontal-spacer
{
  height: calc(100% - 2px); 
  border-bottom: 1px solid #D5D1D1; 
  width: 100%;
}
.core-export-report-container
{
  display: table; 
  height: 100%;
}
.core-export-report-title
{
  display: table-cell; 
  padding: 15px 65px 15px 2px;
  font-size: 11pt;
  color: #4682B4;
  vertical-align: middle;
}
.core-dashboard-reports-box:hover
{
  border: 1px solid #4682B4;
}
.core-dashboard-reports-box
{
  background: rgba(226, 226, 226, 0.2); 
  border: 1px solid #E2E2E2;
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15); 
  border-radius: 5px; 
  display: table; 
  height:100%; 
  width:98%; 
  box-sizing: border-box;
  transition: all .5s ease;
}
</style>

LET $startOfThisMonth := DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()), 1);
RETURN ARRAY( HASH("text", "This week", "value", 7), HASH("text", "This month", "value", CEILING(TODAY() - $startOfThisMonth)), HASH("text", "3 months ago", "value", CEILING(TODAY() - DATEADD("month", -3, $startOfThisMonth))), HASH("text", "6 months ago", "value", CEILING(TODAY() - DATEADD("month", -6, $startOfThisMonth))) )

TextCriterion.Text: CASE WHEN [Status] = 'Submitted' THEN [Found Approver Name] ELSE '' END

CASE
WHEN [Status] = 'Submitted' THEN 'black'
WHEN [Status] = 'Draft' THEN 'black'
WHEN [Status] = 'Approved' THEN '#ffffff'
WHEN [Status] = 'Cancelled' THEN '#4a4a4a'
WHEN [Status] = 'Rejected' THEN '#ffffff'
END
